import React from "react"; import srcX from "../../../../../images/icons/modified/x.svg"; import srcXBlack from "../../../../../images/icons/modified/x_black.svg"; import srcArrow from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/arrows/arrow.svg"; import Popup from "reactjs-popup"; const PopUpVacancy = ({ title, author, description, info, }) => { return (
{title}
{description}
} > {close => (
{title}
{description}
{info}
Надіслати резюме
)} ); }; export { PopUpVacancy as default };
